title: StateFarm Center: Ticketing & Event CMS Platform
description:
Sole front-end engineer responsible for building a CMS-driven marketing and ticketing platform for a large entertainment venue. Owned front-end development from design handoff through responsive implementation, accessibility improvements, and cross-browser QA within a legacy PHP/CodeIgniter environment.

Extended and adapted a modular SCSS architecture to support venue-specific layouts, branding requirements, and complex homepage and event presentation patterns.
contributions: Led end-to-end front-end development across multiple production sprints
Designed modular, reusable SCSS components and layout systems
Built responsive event listing, event detail, and homepage templates
Implemented accessibility and cross-browser improvements within a legacy CMS
outcome: Delivered a production-ready CMS and ticketing platform
Improved maintainability, accessibility, and responsive consistency
Reduced design-to-development friction through structured handoff

title: Metro HC Air Services: SEO-Driven WordPress CMS
description:
Front-end and WordPress developer contributing to the build and ongoing maintenance of a WordPress CMS supporting SEO-driven content growth for a home services brand. Owned front-end templates, CMS components, and form integrations while collaborating with a dedicated development team.

Built ACF-powered templates and integrated Gravity Forms with custom styling, routing, and tracking logic. Supported Core Web Vitals and site-speed initiatives through template optimization and performance tooling.
contributions: Built scalable WordPress templates and ACF-powered components
Integrated Gravity Forms with custom routing and tracking
Implemented responsive layouts and accessibility improvements
Supported performance and Core Web Vitals optimization
outcome: Enabled non-technical editors to manage SEO-focused content
Improved accessibility, readability, and mobile responsiveness
Supported SEO and performance goals through optimized templates
